definitions: in a way that relates to the instincts, physiological processes, and activities connected with physical attraction or intimate physical contact between individuals

examples.text: I'm sexually attracted to powerful people

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to instincts and activities connected with physical attraction

definitions: in a way that relates to the two sexes or to gender
shortDefinitions: in way that relates to two sexes or to gender

definitions: in a way that relates to sexual reproduction

examples.text: bees can reproduce sexually or asexually

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to sexual reproduction
